1101010011010000 1001101001010101 0 -> sum: 0110111100100101, cout: 1

1010011010101000 1010111001001101 1 -> sum: 0101010011110110, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
